sentences.en: A more sedate option is the lovely old steamship TSS Earnslaw.
sentences.cn: 如果要选择更安静一点的方式,则有古董蒸汽轮船恩斯罗号.

sentences.en: A steamship moored to its berth at the pier.
sentences.cn: 这是一艘帆船,而非汽船.

sentences.en: At last, I ride steamship to Jiangxinyu.
sentences.cn: 最后乘轮船到达江心屿.

sentences.en: Concerts were often held in the saloon of the steamship.
sentences.cn: 音乐会常在这轮船的大厅中举行.

sentences.en: He telephoned the steamship office to find out at what hour the steamer was due.
sentences.cn: 他打电话给汽轮局查询那艘汽轮什么时刻到达.

sentences.en: He telephoned the steamship office to find out what time the steamer is due.
sentences.cn: 他打电话到轮船公司办公室询问轮船何时到达.

sentences.en: Hsin - mei , here's the money for the steamship tickets. "
sentences.cn: 辛楣, 买船票的钱还给你. ”

sentences.en: If junk-borne shipments of wheat increased along with the expansion of railway and steamship carriage, the overall argument about the survival and growth of the junk trade is greatly strengthened.
sentences.cn: 如果经营小麦的舢板运输随着铁路、火轮船运输的扩张而增长的话，那么所有关于舢板贸易幸存和成长的论点都将得到加强。

sentences.en: It was so foggy that the steamship almost ran down a small boat leaving the port.
sentences.cn: 雾很大,汽艇差点把一只正在离港的小船撞沉.

sentences.en: One thousand passengers from the big steamship are on shore.
sentences.cn: 这艘大船上的一千人现在在岸上.

sentences.en: Only four years later, the first steamship crossed the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.cn: 仅仅四年之后，第一艘蒸汽船横渡了大西洋。

sentences.en: Our steamship will set sail on 11:00, the day after tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们的轮船将于后天11:00启碇.

sentences.en: The first development in modern transportation was the steamship.
sentences.cn: 现代交通工具的首次飞跃是轮船.

sentences.en: The return may be made on the same steamship.
sentences.cn: 可乘同一艘汽船当天回来.

sentences.en: The steamship veered around for the port.
We saw that there was an oncoming steamship on the river.
sentences.cn: 我们看到河面上有一艘汽轮正在向这边驶来.

sentences.en: Which was the first ／ fastest ／ next steamship that crossed the Atlantic?
sentences.cn: 哪艘轮船首先/最快/随于其后横渡了大西洋?

words.tran_cn: 蒸汽的；雾重的，潮湿的；充满蒸汽的

trans.tran_en: a large ship that uses steam to produce power
